attributes.action: Scrap the English football league cup and also the FA cup and bring a new cup
attributes.additional_details: In England the EFL Cup and FA cup are getting worse each year with under strengthened teams competing and stadiums empty also with semi final and final being in Wembley the joy and excitement has gone but this will bring it back also semi finals and final will be played at different venues each we e.g Wembley millennium stadium hampden park and Windsor park will be used
attributes.background:
english football league cup and the FA cup will be scrapped to introduce A new cup called The Great British Cup where teams from England Scotland Wales and Northern Ireland will be allowed to
Compete each year and final venue change each year to relevant country
